details.text:
This is designed for the Architect to decompose into tasks for the Alchemist and Sentinel.
Directive: Kinetic Modernization - Turtle WoW (Legacy 1.12.1)
Objective: Overhaul the provided legacy client directory to support modern hardware and high-fidelity visuals while maintaining the 'Vanilla' feel.
Task List for Agents:
The Alchemist (Visuals/Assets): > - Locate all environment and character texture packs.
Run an automated 4K ESRGAN Upscale on low-resolution assets.
Inject a modern DirectX 12 or Vulkan wrapper to enable multi-core CPU usage and reduce overhead.
The Sentinel (Stability/Code): > - Scan the WoW.exe and associated DLLs for the legacy 32-bit memory limit.
Apply a Large Address Aware (LAA) patch to allow the client to use more than 2GB of RAM.
Optimize the networking code to reduce latency "jitter" on modern high-speed connections.
The Stealth Engine (Security/Optimization): > -

This is designed for the Architect to decompose into tasks for the Alchemist and Sentinel.

Directive: Kinetic Modernization - Turtle WoW (Legacy 1.12.1)

Objective: Overhaul the provided legacy client directory to support modern hardware and high-fidelity visuals while maintaining the 'Vanilla' feel.

Task List for Agents:

The Alchemist (Visuals/Assets): >    - Locate all environment and character texture packs.

Run an automated 4K ESRGAN Upscale on low-resolution assets.

Inject a modern DirectX 12 or Vulkan wrapper to enable multi-core CPU usage and reduce overhead.

The Sentinel (Stability/Code): >    - Scan the WoW.exe and associated DLLs for the legacy 32-bit memory limit.

Apply a Large Address Aware (LAA) patch to allow the client to use more than 2GB of RAM.

Optimize the networking code to reduce latency "jitter" on modern high-speed connections.

The Stealth Engine (Security/Optimization): >    - Sanitize all local file paths within the config files to ensure privacy.

Optimize the Config.wtf settings to balance the 8GB VRAM limit between textures and draw distance.

Output Requirement: > - Final Synthesis: Provide a consolidated 'copy-paste'


 package of the modified files once the plan is finalized and tested.

Report: Include a log of all "Modernization Wins" (e.g., FPS gains, VRAM efficiency).
the folder is on my desktop called modernize within that folder is Turtle Wow folder
the one the agents are working on
please ask them to make sure the media,video audio areas are working properly, i couldnt get them to work right
